stimulusHtml: Which of the following conclusions can be drawn in relation to the trend presented between 1900 and 1940 in the graph?

features.html:
• The Number of Migrants data for the 10 bars are as follows:

    • 1900s: 200,000

    • 1910s: 440,000

    • 1920s: 810,000

    • 1930s: 390,000

    • 1940s: 1,450,000

    • 1950s: 1,110,000

    • 1960s: 1,000,000

    • 1970s: 800,000

    • 1980s: 600,000

    • 1990s: 510,000

choicesHtml: African Americans transitioned from living in urban centers to living in rural communities.
African American musical traditions like jazz and the blues were transferred from Southern states to Northern states.
African Americans became inclined to serve in the U.S. military after migrating to Northern cities.
African Americans were largely unable to find work even after migrating to urban centers in Northern states.
